panels.description:
The time that the job has been running without interruption.
Returns -1 for completed jobs (in milliseconds).

reduceOptions.fields: /^flink_jobmanager_job_uptime\{container="flink\-main\-container", endpoint="prometheus", host="flink_app_flink", instance="10\.244\.15\.12:9249", job="flink/flink\-application\-pod\-monitor", job_id="c8c2745bf03709c333765f5b324b1d52", job_name="flink_app", namespace="flink", pod="flink\-app\-fb5d75b77\-wz2bf"\}$/

panels.title: Job Uptime

panels.description:
For jobs currently in a failing/recovering situation, the time elapsed during this outage.
Returns 0 for running jobs and -1 for completed jobs (in milliseconds).

reduceOptions.fields: /^flink_jobmanager_job_downtime\{container="flink\-main\-container", endpoint="prometheus", host="flink_app_flink", instance="10\.244\.15\.12:9249", job="flink/flink\-application\-pod\-monitor", job_id="c8c2745bf03709c333765f5b324b1d52", job_name="flink_app", namespace="flink", pod="flink\-app\-fb5d75b77\-wz2bf"\}$/

panels.title: Job Downtime

panels.description: The total number of full restarts since this job was submitted. Attention: Since 1.9.2, this metric also includes fine-grained restarts.
panels.title: Job Full Restarts

panels.description: The time it took to restart the job, or how long the current restart has been in progress (in milliseconds).

reduceOptions.fields: /^flink_jobmanager_job_restartingTime\{container="flink\-main\-container", endpoint="prometheus", host="flink_app_flink", instance="10\.244\.15\.12:9249", job="flink/flink\-application\-pod\-monitor", job_id="c8c2745bf03709c333765f5b324b1d52", job_name="flink_app", namespace="flink", pod="flink\-app\-fb5d75b77\-wz2bf"\}$/

panels.title: Job restartingTime
Latest event watermark under processing by slowest task

panels.description:
The number of buffered bytes during alignment over all subtasks for the last checkpoint (in bytes).
The total size of the last checkpoint (in bytes).
panels.title: Checkpointing Size

panels.description: The time it took to complete the last checkpoint (in milliseconds).

reduceOptions.fields: /^flink_jobmanager_job_lastCheckpointDuration\{container="flink\-main\-container", endpoint="prometheus", host="flink_app_flink", instance="10\.244\.15\.12:9249", job="flink/flink\-application\-pod\-monitor", job_id="c8c2745bf03709c333765f5b324b1d52", job_name="flink_app", namespace="flink", pod="flink\-app\-fb5d75b77\-wz2bf"\}$/

panels.title: Last CP Duration

panels.description: Timestamp when the last checkpoint was restored at the coordinator (in milliseconds).

reduceOptions.fields: /^flink_jobmanager_job_lastCheckpointRestoreTimestamp\{container="flink\-main\-container", endpoint="prometheus", host="flink_app_flink", instance="10\.244\.15\.12:9249", job="flink/flink\-application\-pod\-monitor", job_id="c8c2745bf03709c333765f5b324b1d52", job_name="flink_app", namespace="flink", pod="flink\-app\-fb5d75b77\-wz2bf"\}$/

panels.title: Last Restore timestamp

panels.description:
The total number of collections that have occurred.	
The total time spent performing garbage collection.
panels.title: JobManager GC (rate 1m interval)

panels.description:
The total number of classes loaded since the start of the JVM.  
The total number of classes unloaded since the start of the JVM.
panels.title: Classes Loaded/Unloaded

panels.description: The recent CPU usage of the JVM.
panels.title: JVM_CPU_Load

panels.description: The CPU time used by the JVM.
panels.title: JVM_CPU_Time

panels.description: The total number of live threads.
panels.title: JVM_Threads_Count

panels.description: The number of allocated memory segments.
panels.title: Shuffle_Netty_TotalMemorySegments

panels.description: The number of unused memory segments.
panels.title: Shuffle_Netty_AvailableMemorySegments

panels.description: The last watermark this operator/tasks has received (in milliseconds).
panels.title: Top 10 slowest operators (based on current INPUT watermark)

panels.description: The last watermark this operator/tasks has received (in milliseconds).
panels.title: Top 10 slowest tasks (based on current INPUT watermark)
Top 10 slowest tasks (based on current OUTPUT watermark)
Top 10 slowest tasks (based on current OUTPUT watermark)

panels.description: The number of records this operator/task has dropped due to arriving late. Only operators using timeWindow()
panels.title: Num Late Records Dropped (timeWindow operators) 1min rate

panels.description: The number of records this operator/task receives per second.
panels.title: numRecordsInPerSecond

panels.description: The number of records this operator/task sends per second.
panels.title: numRecordsOutPerSecond

panels.description: The last watermark this operator/tasks has received (in milliseconds).
panels.title: Top 10 slowest tasks (based on current input watermark)

panels.description: The last watermark this operator/tasks has received (in milliseconds).
panels.title: Top 10 fastest tasks (based on current input watermark)

panels.description:
Whether the task is back-pressured.
1 - yes. 0 - no
panels.title: isBackPressured

panels.description: The time (in milliseconds) this task is idle (either has no data to process or it is back pressured) per second.
panels.title: idleTimeMsPerSecond

panels.description: The time in nanoseconds that the last barrier alignment took to complete, or how long the current alignment has taken so far (in nanoseconds).
panels.title: checkpointAlignmentTime

panels.description: The time in nanoseconds that elapsed between the creation of the last checkpoint and the time when the checkpointing process has started by this Task. This delay shows how long it takes for the first checkpoint barrier to reach the task. A high value indicates back-pressure. If only a specific task has a long start delay, the most likely reason is data skew.
panels.title: checkpointStartDelayNanos

panels.description: The number of records this operator/task receives per second.
panels.title: numRecordsInPerSecond

panels.description: The number of records this operator/task sends per second.
panels.title: numRecordsOutPerSecond

panels.description: The number of network buffers this task emits per second.
panels.title: numBuffersOutPerSecond

panels.description:
The number of bytes this task reads from a local source per second.	
The number of bytes this task reads from a remote source per second.
panels.title: Input Bytes Local/Remote per second

panels.description:
The total number of network buffers this task has read from a local source.	
The total number of network buffers this task has read from a remote source.
panels.title: # Buffers in Local/Remote per second

panels.description: inPoolUsage  - An estimate of the input buffers usage.
panels.title: Shuffle.Netty.Input.Buffers.inPoolUsage

panels.description: The number of queued input buffers.
panels.title: Shuffle.Netty.Input.Buffers.inputQueueLength

panels.description: An estimate of the exclusive input buffers usage. (ignores LocalInputChannels)
panels.title: Shuffle.Netty.Input.Buffers.inputExclusiveBuffersUsage

panels.description: An estimate of the floating input buffers usage. (ignores LocalInputChannels)
panels.title: Shuffle.Netty.Input.Buffers.inputFloatingBuffersUsage

panels.description: An estimate of the output buffers usage.
panels.title: Shuffle.Netty.Output.Buffers.outPoolUsage

panels.description: The number of queued output buffers.
panels.title: Shuffle.Netty.Output.Buffers.outputQueueLength
